title: By the King, a proclamation requiring the members of both Houses of Parliament to attend at the time prefixed by the adjournment, being the twenty fourth day of October next
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the one and twentieth of August 1670. In the two and twentieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
